values: It's been a few weeks...but life has been a little nuts.  The drive sucks, but you gotta help family.  Being single is rough, but good for me.  At least I can do what I wanna do when I wanna do it.  Granted...some of it has turned out horrible...but you gotta learn the hard way sometimes.  SO, October 15th, I'm headed to the FSU vs. Virginia game!!!  WOOHOO!!!  It will be my first game since I was in the Chiefs!!!!   I cannot wait..it's gonna be a blast!!!  Work is GREAT!!!!  In September, I am heading to Denver to see my stores...paid for by the head honcho out there  : )  I AM SOOOOOO EXCITED!!!!!  I get there on 9/19 around 2pm and get back 9/22-23 at Midnight!!! I cannot wait to see someplace new!!!  Well, other than that, nothing much else going on.  I'll try to fill everyone in a little more often!!!  Drop me a message anytime : )

SO CAN I JUST SAY THAT LIFE FREAKING SUCKS!!!  I'M OVER IT ALL!!!!  I WANT TO MOVE, I WANT TO NOT TO HAVE TO SUPPORT OTHER PEOPLE ALL THE TIME AT MY EXPENSE!!!  I DON'T LIKE WHAT IS GOING ON RIGHT NOW!!!  I JUST WANT TO RUN AWAY.
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/6665.html

Okay.  So the hatred has now turned to...am I that bad that I keep getting pushed away?!  I know I am better and stronger than to think that, but I can't help it.  I just don't understand.  I know not all guys are like that....just most of the ones I tend to run into.  The thing is....some of them, well, actually, one of them, I would still love to see because I always wonder where it could've gone.  I don't hate them.  I just don't understand what has happened.  If someone can shed some light on this, I would be grateful.  I hate doubts, especially when they are about myself.  I know I am stronger for getting through every challenge that is thrown my way.  I'm sure some of them are also my fault.  It just hurts.  It's amazing what a few events in life will do to your head.  Anyway, enough depressing info.  I am going to find something fun to do over the weekend.  the weather looks good, so maybe a day at the beach.  I am looking to head up north in a month or so, to visit Angie.  I miss her terribly!!!    I would love to live near her again!!!  Well, time to take the hour and a hlf drive home...EEEEEEK!!!  Anyway, hope everyone is getting along ok.  Talk at ya later.

P.S.  FOOTBALL SEASON NEEDS TO START!!!!!!
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/6536.html

I know some of you ladies will agree with me...GUYS DON'T HAVE ANY BALLS!!!!  I'm done, I'm over it.  I'm going to lock myself in my own little world so I don't have to deal with the bullcrap any longer!!!!  Don't act all interested, and then run the other way!!  WHAT THE F@!*   And they say women have issues!!!  I'm not asking for a life commitment here people, just don't act one way one second and then flip sides the next!!!!!  IT'S FREAKING RIDICULOUS!!!  Or at least explain what the hell happened!!!!  People can change their minds, but at least let the other party know what the F?*! happened!!!!  Alright, I gotta calm down so I can work now.  Talk at you later.
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/6288.html

Ok, so I'm a little slow in posting...Month End Close people!!!! Anyway, the 4th of July was a BLAST!!! Went and hung out in Brandon with Pamela and a few friends. All I can say is THANK GOD FOR SHOTS OF SMIRNOFF!!!!  Someone's grandma shared that feeling with me...and smacked a guy across the face!!!  Kind of funny. So things got a little crazy after that and the gang changed party locations.  The drinking continued.  We all decided to watch Kill Bill.  What a freaking messed up movie!!!!  Not that I should be surprised, considering it's a Terentino flick.  After that, it was sleepy time.  The next day was time to clean...found some old, scary pictures....some, of course, went into the garbage.  : )  Other than that, life is pretty non-eventful.  Work, sleep, work, sleep.  So now, it's time for work.  Yesterday, I had a managing partner yell at me because I told him he actually had to pay for invoices he submitted for payment.  Then he told me I was the reason he was losing money!!! What a freaking jack ass!!!!  I about hopped through the phone and strangled him!!!!  But, this weekend, I think it's time for a trip to my favorite place..DISNEY!!!  It's an addiction, I know.  Although, right now, I'm just in the mood to get into some trouble.  The girl in the cube behind me better watch it today...I'm in one of those crazy moods.  In the immortal words of my favorite Jessica...."I'm not bad, I'm just drawn that way"
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/5665.html

Life is so good right now.  Yesterday was a girl night. We went and grabbed some food and saw SpiderMan 2.  WHAT AN AWESOME MOVIE!!!!  A little cheesy in spots, but definitely worth every cent you pay to get into it. Last night, even better.  Pamela (a friend from work) and I went and worked out after staying really late  at work.  Then we went to Carrabba's for dinner...WHAT FUN!!!!  I'll spare the details, but at the conclusion the waiter brought us each a strawberry covered in chocolate and gave us each a fresh loaf of bread with oil and herbs to go with our leftovers!!!!  After that, we went out with some of the guys from work.  I must say, there actually are real gentlemen in the world.  I was totally impressed.  I'm just speechless about the whole thing!!!  I'll have to share the details later.  I must get back to work...It's month end close and I'm trying not to be here late again.  I'll leave everyone with my favorite new picture:
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/5566.html

Not much going on..I'm damn ready to move after the freaking 2-hour drive in to work this morning.  I know where my next vacation is...MARDI GRAS!!!!  Me and an old friend are going to go.  I can't wait for the debauchery--not that any of you are surprised by this.  Work is about to get crazy, gotta love the end of a financial quarter!!!  There are a few other things that just can't be shared...the important ones know the good and the bad.  That's all folks!!!
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/5370.html

All I have to say is that life is good.  Things are looking WONDERFUL!!!!  Having a ton of fun with the people from work....Great party people!!!! (Details on that are for the privileged few only)  And I am so ready to move into the new place.  It can't come soon enough!!!!  I don't think I've ever felt this good about myself.  Confidence is slowly creeping back into my life, and it feels so damn good.  I'm ready to go out for the weekend...any thoughts or takers on the offer..LET ME KNOW!!!!
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/4990.html

Some people confuse me.  I'm sure I confuse some people.  What's up with saying one thing one second and then changing your mind an instant later?! So that's enough with that.  Work is well...no team leaders here today, so we all look like kids who were left with a substitute teacher for the day!!!  It's a blast!!!  Life is life.  Some things are good, other things are difficult to deal with.  I'm definitely ready to move in to the new place, and have some good times!!!  That's about it...There's probably more I could share, just feeling pretty tight lipped about it all at the moment.  Talk at you all later.
http://disney-boo.livejournal.com/4768.html

Here's me:  Working, driving, trying not to let others bring me down.  It's difficult soemtimes though.  You try so hard to take care of everyone else, that you end up neglecting yourself.  Which, in turn causes you to regret your choices, doubt yourself,  and keeps you from truly being able to function.  I found out an interesting piece of information a few days ago...and it's eating me up.  A past ex is back in town..and I think,  for my own sanity,  I need to look at him.  He made a mess out of me, of his own admission, and I think I need to let him know he didn't break me.  Kind of sad, but I never got to finish dealing with that disaster.  Yes, I have enough baggage to become a Samsonite Warehouse!!!  Well, that's aobut it.  I'll leave everyone with this:

You could never know what it's like
Your blood like winter freezes just like ice
And there's a cold lonely light that shines from you
You'll wind up like the wreck you hide behind that mask you use

And did you think this fool could never win
Well look at me, I'm coming back again
I got a taste of love in a simple way
And if you need to know while I'm still standing you just fade away

Don't you know I'm still standing better than I ever did
Looking like a true survivor, feeling like a little kid
I'm still standing after all this time
Picking up the pieces of my life without you on my mind

I'm still standing yeah yeah yeah
I'm still standing yeah yeah yeah

Once I never could hope to win
You starting down the road leaving me again
The threats you made were meant to cut me down
And if our love was just a circus you'd be a clown by now

                       ~Sir Elton John

Hello all.  Sitting at work, pretty content with my life right now.  I get to play with my kitty...not that one you SICKO'S!!!   The drive sucks, but it's good reflection time.  I keep thinking about all the awesome things that are about to happen.  I'm going to get roommates that I LIKE!!!!  I CANNOT WAIT!!!  And I'll finally have some shopping buddies.  Maybe Jen can teach me some things....cause God knows I need help in that area!!!  I'll get some vacation time soon.  I just need to decide where I wanna go.  I have a few thoughts about where I want to go, but that partially depends on other people, so I'm not setting my heart on that.  Could I have been any more vague there?  Some of you know what I'm speaking of, I'll just leave it at that.  It's nice to be on my own.  Well, so I don't get too sappy here, I'm gonna cut this short.  Besides, I should be working.

So the last pictue was from Friday.  It got screwed up somehow, so hopefully it will stay up now.   Anyway, so I moved my stuff out this morning, at 4am...so yes I'm tired.  Things went kind of ok.  I don't feel like going into it here, you know how to get in touch with me if you want the details.  Yes, I'm still feeling guilty.  But I also know that it needed to be done.  I will now be making the 1-1/2 hour trip from Homosassa to get to work. At least until August....when I move in with Jen, Beth & Rachel.  I AM SO EXCITED!!!!    It's finally Jessica Time!!!!  Things will get better, I know they will.  I don't feel like I'm making much sense right now, because I'm so tired.  So I'll add more info later.

Well, It's been an interesting 24 hours. He knows I want to step back from this. The news wasn't taken well. I tried to let him know I wanted to still do things, just seeing each other constantly isn't healthy right now. Am I being too soft? I'm not saying if I was in his situation I would react differently. I know this is the best thing...so why do I feel so guilty for doing what I need to do. Like people have told me before...I am a doormat. I always put everyone's happiness before mine. I think it's time I start considering my feelings along with others. But that doesn't take away this awful feeling that I am hurting someone. It sucks!! I just feel horrible. If anyone can shed any light on this...feel free. I'll leave everyone with this (it's quite fitting):

In the mirror is where she comes face to face with her fears
Her own reflection, now foreign to her after all these years
All of her life she has tried to be something besides herself
Now time has passed and she's ended up someone else with regret

What is it in us that makes us feel the need to keep pretending
Gotta let ourselves be
                                                       ~Christina Aguilera

Sorry for all the trauma drama last evening.  Thanks for being there and understanding...you all know who you are.  At a loss for words, so that's about it.

(WARNING: All names have been removed to protect the innocent)  OK, so Saturday was a good day/night.  I was at Disney, my favorite place in the world, as most of you know.  I didn't get to see the EPCOT fireworks : (  But the person I was with wanted to leave....AGAIN!!!!  But, whatever.  So I get back home to watch the Lightning game (they won, THANK GOD), and the roommate had some friends over...finally some people contact!!!!  So, I have  few drinks and the group determined we needed more, so off I go to go pick up some more--not to worry I didn't drive!!! I get back and continue to drink.  Well, the first thing to piss me off occurs...It's a Saturday, I'm drinking having a good time...and the freaking idiot goes to sleep and doesn't say a damn word to me.  What the hell is up with that?!  Why am I even here?!  What am I doing wrong?!  I don't get it.  I'm not that ugly, I'm fun(when I'm allowed).  So anyway, I decided that it was my damn turn to have some fun...so F*?! IT!!!  I continued to drink (I think we can all see where this is eventually going to end up) One particular person that was there that night continues to stick out in my head.  He was cute, very nice, and good to talk to.  His eyes were almost speaking to me.  I think, that when you look into someone's eyes, you can read alot into a person...I saw good things.  Yes, I was flirting.  I'm not sure if he appreciated that or not, but I was hoping.  Then all of a sudden, all the power went out.  Apparently, someone had hit an electric pole with their car.  After we had made a little amount of noise the monster awoke, was pissed about what was going on and he and a few of the guys went to check it out.  I stayed at the apt.  After they got back, he went back into the room, and once again, said absolutely nothing to me.  WHAT THE F*@!  I'm over it, I wish he would just act like my feelings mattered.  Anyway, back to the story...  Then 2 of the guys went for a walk to try to walk off the alcohol and I and one of the guys stayed in the apartment.  That's when it hit me that I was sooooo drunk.  Yes, the sickness began.  The guy that had stayed in the apt, helped me to the bathroom.  He even came back to check to make sure I was ok...very sweet guy!!!  I made it back to the couch, he kept checking that I was ok as I began to fall asleep.  I could feel his warm body behind me...This tells you what a nice guy he was because he tried to make no moves on me (not that the thought hadn't entered my mind).  his arm was on the back of the couch and I leaned into him.  It felt wonderful.  He kept using his hand to gently, softly rub my back.  Something that comforts me and makes me feel wonderful (he was not aware of that, I just think it is interesting that it was done perfectly by him).  I then wanted him to know that I appreciated what he was doing for me.  (NO PEOPLE--I DIDN'T GO THERE!!!) I could feel his skin under his shirt.  It was so soft.  I hope he understood what I was trying to say.  It just felt so wonderful to be held, I felt so comfortable after a very short time of talking to him.  I wanted him to wrap his arms around me and hold me close, but I understand why he didn't.  Then, a little while later, I began to get sick again.  So I had to go into the room, take care of myself...and he awoke.  Not that he cared before, but anyway...I cam back out on the couch afterwards, and began to go to sleep again.  I didn't want to be in the room.  He had angered me sooooooooo much.  As I laid on the couch, he asked me again if I was ok.  He reached his hand over, and I held it.  To try to let him know I wanted him there.  It was wonderful.  But then the bedroom door opened, and his hand pulled away.  The monster came out of the room and insisted I go into the bedroom.  It was only like he wanted me in there because he didn't want anyone else to spend time with me.  Where the hell had he been all night...oh yeah...sleeping!!!  It felt like too little too late.  I was still pissed!!!!  I tried to tell my wonderful caretaker thank you, but I'm not sure if he could see me.  I think I have figured out his screen name on AOL, but I'm not positive I have his last name right.  I just want to tell him thank you, and that my actions werent' the alcohol speaking.  How do I know you ask?!  Because I still feel the same, and I can't get him out of my head.  I would love to go to lunch with him...or better yet, take him to lunch to say thanks.  Well, that was my weekend.  Crazy stuff.  My life is changing, for the better, and I just need to learn to be strong and folllow my heart, my true feelings.  If anyone knows who I am speaking of, and can assist me in this endeavor, please do.  Sorry for the novel-sized entry, I just had alot to get off my chest.  Talk to all of you soon!!!

So someone help me out here. Am I crazy?!  I can't think straight.  I was told earlier this evening that I am annoying and I embarrass people.  If I do, will someone please be straight up with me.  I know part of this is a self-confidence thing with me...so I apologize for being one of those girls. It doesn't happen often, but it does happen.  I just want to know that someone will like/love me for me.  Wheter I am being sweet, the occaisional party girl, listener, the sports nut...whatever.  It irritates me when I am told that I am not good enough.  All I know how to do is be me.  I guess I just want to know if I am losing my  mind and that I am wanted (in many different ways).  Someone...anyone help me here..

Okay, so I've decided that since I don't see alot of you very often, to start one of these.  Hopefully it will help us stay closer....Okay, enough sappy stuff--for the moment anyway.   Well, I love my job...except for the fact that it is so far from the city I want to be closest to.  Most of my co-workers are AWESOME!!!  So..it's decision time.  Where will I live in a few months.  My heart is telling me to go with Jen...I think it would be good for me.  NO one to tell me that I need to be more compassionate, that I need to do things better, no more feeling like I'm not good enough!!!  Well, I am planning a trip up north in the fall.  Just don't know when to go yet for sure.  I CANNOT WAIT!!!  I just hope that things work out as best they can in that situation....yes, i'm nervous about it.  I won't force them.  If it is meant to happen, it will.  Happiness and comfort, on both sides, is the most important thing.  Well, I'm at work, so I should get back to that.  I'll just leave everyone with this....


If you said goodbye to me tonight
There would still be music left to write
What else could I do
I'm so inspired by you
That hasn't happened for the longest time

Once I thought my innocence was gone
Now I know that happiness goes on
That's where you found me
When you put your arms around me
I haven't been there for the longest time

For the longest time
Oh, oh, oh
For the longest
I'm that voice you're hearing in the hall
And the greatest miracle of all
Is how I need you
And how you needed me too
That hasn't happened for the longest time

Maybe this won't last very long
But you feel so right
And I could be wrong
Maybe I've been hoping too hard
But I've gone this far
And it's more than I hoped for

Who knows how much further we'll go on
Maybe I'll be sorry when you're gone
I'll take my chances
I forgot how nice romance is
I haven't been there for the longest time

I had second thoughts at the start
I said to myself
Hold on to your heart
Now I know the woman that you are
You're wonderful so far
And it's more than I hoped for

I don't care what consequence it brings
I have been a fool for lesser things
I want you so bad
I think you ought to know that
I intend to hold you for the longest time
